summary:
Discord is a popular online tool that helps people connect and chat. It's like a big virtual hangout spot! You can talk through text, voice, or video calls, and even join groups called "servers" to chat with others who share your interests. These servers can be private or open to everyone.

With around 150 million users, it's mainly used by gamers, but anyone can join. You can use Discord on your computer or phone, and it's super easy to access through apps or web browsers. It's become one of the top websites worldwide, showing how popular it is!
title: Discord
